title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; interact with the Ollama REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer; use Ollama models as LLMs, embedders, or tool-wielding agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI); model manager, RAG, multi-user, plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings, and tool support.

title: ollama-rag-py
summary: Minimal RAG template; ingest PDFs → Chroma → Ollama embeddings & chat in <100 lines.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal UI chat built with Textual; markdown, history, model switcher, keyboard driven.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-chem
summary: Chemistry-aware Ollama tools: SMILES-to-IUPAC, property prediction, reaction enumeration.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama replies in threads; slash commands, model picker, per-guild config.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node; drag-and-drop Ollama chat, embeddings, or tool nodes into automation workflows.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight async Rust client; generate, chat, embed, and pull models via Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-rag-redis
summary: Real-time RAG stack using Redis Stack (vector search + JSON) and Ollama embeddings/chat.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that answers questions with Ollama; thread-aware, model switching, rate limits.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama model management, chat API, and admin UI for on-prem LLM apps.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama as a tool to any MCP client (Claude Desktop, etc.).

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper with GenServer behavior; stream chat, manage models, and supervise Ollama connections.
